heading: HB00038
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION TO REQUIRE INTERNET SERVICE PROVIDERS TO DELIVER A MINIMUM STANDARD OF 10 MEGABYTES PER SECOND (10MBPS) FOR INTERNET CONNECTION SPEED
short-title: Mandating The National Telecommunications Commission To Require Internet Service Providers To Deliver A Minimum Standard Of 10 Megabytes Per Second (10mbps) For Internet Connection Speed
status: Pending with the Committee on INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY since 2019-07-23
